com.tangosol.net

Interface FederatedCacheService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CacheService, ClassLoaderAware, Controllable, DistributedCacheService, PartitionedService, Service

    public interface FederatedCacheService
extends DistributedCacheService
    A FederatedCacheService is a distributed cache service that also replicates data to other clusters/participants in the Federation.
    Author:
    pp 2013.06.18

    • Method Detail

      • updateParticipantState

        void updateParticipantState(String sParticipant,
                            com.tangosol.internal.federation.participant.StateChangeCommand stateChangeCmd)
        Update Participant FSM state for replication of journal records.
        Parameters:
        sParticipant - Participant or null if all the participants state should be updated
        stateChangeCmd - State change command
